content: When creating Logical Models, what is the purpose of the 'isSummary" element. As Logical Models are abstract can they ever be queried?
I don't think it's really relevant. Is it causing a problem? Or are you just looking for an official statement of "not applicable for logical models"?
@Lloyd McKenzie primarily seeking confirmation my thinking was correct. Looking at http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/request.html#resource it does seem to get used in some logical models.
